attributes.action: Ensure UK's offshore companies to grantee freedom from forced labor and cruelty.
attributes.background: Many UK's offshore companies relocated their factories to countries like China, India, Bangladesh etc because of cheap labor, where working conditions are not protected by well-enforced rules, hence working conditions are very bad; workers are often forced to work in cruel environments, no freedom!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
